last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mi-joo’s work gets a director noticed overseas. Yeong-hwa and Dan-ah achieve their own goals. Seon-gyeom officially becomes a sports agent.

name: Run On
overview: Veering off course from his preset path, a track star follows his own pace and heart for the first time after a film translator steps into his life.
tagline: When you run, you don't think about what's behind you. The only thing that matters is what's right in front of you.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Ki Seon-gyeom notices bruises on Kim Woo-sik's body. Trying to get back into her professor's good graces, Oh Mi-joo takes on an interpreting gig.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Seon-gyeom gets revenge on Woo-sik's behalf, but is disheartened by the coaches' inaction. Mi-joo and Seon-gyeom bond over a movie and drink

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Handing her a handsome reward, Ki Jeong-do asks Mi-joo for a favor. Seon-gyeom's rage over Woo-sik's unjust injury boils over in Jeju Island.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Seo Dan-ah gives Woo-sik a chance to set the record straight. Seon-gyeom bids farewell to track and confronts Mi-joo about the payoff from his father.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Lee Yeong-hwa tries to compensate Dan-ah for her broken bracelet. Mi-joo translates and shares Woo-sik's interview online to clear Seon-gyeom's name.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Retired and unemployed, Seon-gyeom accepts Mi-joo's offer to stay at her home. Dan-ah convinces Yeong-hwa to submit a new painting for the gallery.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Mi-joo becomes concerned, then angry, when Seon-gyeom stays out all night. Yeong-hwa's persistence pays off with a surprise visit from Dan-ah.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: At a movie premiere, Yeong-hwa clears up Mi-joo's misunderstanding about Seon-gyeom's night. She goes on a business trip, leaving Seon-gyeom home alone.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Mi-joo and Seon-gyeom grow close, then apart, during their work trip. Yeong-hwa puts his foot down during a heated argument with Dan-ah.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Mi-joo and Seon-gyeom start dating. Seeking perspective on her situation with Yeong-hwa, Dan-ah invites herself into Mi-joo's home for a drink.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Seon-gyeom takes the lead in helping Woo-sik get back on track. Dan-ah realizes the reason behind her admiration for Yeong-hwa's artwork.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Unhappy with Seon-gyeom's disobedience, Jeong-do takes out his anger on Mi-joo. Dan-ah allows herself to smile in Yeong-hwa's embrace.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Mi-joo and Seon-gyeom tearfully agree to take some time apart. Yeong-hwa's planned birthday party for Dan-ah starts and ends in chaos.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Missing Yeong-hwa, Dan-ah spends a night with him in his seaside hometown. Mi-joo runs her first marathon. Seon-gyeom is peeved by his father's plans.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Goh Ye-jun comes out to his family. Ki Eun-bi finds solace in Mi-joo's home. Yeong-hwa unveils his masterpiece and love for Dan-ah.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Mi-joo’s work gets a director noticed overseas. Yeong-hwa and Dan-ah achieve their own goals. Seon-gyeom officially becomes a sports agent.
